verbose_text: The discovery that BLs were mostly found in mice injected with Ad5-CMV-Cre and only very rarely in mice injected with Ad5-CGRP-Cre (XREF_FIG E-1H, XREF_FIG A, and 2B), points to the existence of an unknown cell of origin that does not express CGRP, but, upon deletion of Rb1 and Trp53, activates CGRP expression.
